data.name: ElementTypeDescription
data.value: The data tye of the xml element

data.name: MinOccursDescription
data.value: The minimum accurence of the element, value is 0 or 1

data.name: MaxOccursDescription
data.value: The maximum accurence of the element, value is 1 or unbounded

data.name: ImportScriptNamesDescription
data.value: Specify names of import scripts used to import data from data sources other than database

data.name: DataSourceOptionDescription
data.value: Specify the data source where a xml element get its values

data.name: IsMergingInstancesDescription
data.value: Specify whether to merge the xml element instances when data come from the multiple data sources

data.name: InstanceIdentifyAttributeDescription
data.value: Specify an xml element attribute whose value uniquely identifies an instance

data.name: FilterConditionDescription
data.value: Specify the condition that filters qualifies instances from the specified data sources

data.name: ValidateConditionDescription
data.value: Specify the condition is used to run against the dataset generated by the import scripts to determine if the import data is valid or not

data.name: IsSortEnabledDescription
data.value: Specify whether the element is used for sorting purpose

data.name: SortOrderDescription
data.value: Order when there are multiple elements participating in a sort

data.name: IsSortAscendingDescription
data.value: Specify whether the sort direction is ascending or descening
